Uses of Interface
oracle.dbtools.plugin.api.json.objects.JSONArray.Builder

  • Packages that use JSONArray.Builder 
    Package Description
    oracle.dbtools.plugin.api.json.objects
    API for creating in memory representations of JSON object graphs (JSONObjects) and for serializing object graphs to JSON representations.

    • Uses of JSONArray.Builder in oracle.dbtools.plugin.api.json.objects

      Methods in oracle.dbtools.plugin.api.json.objects that return JSONArray.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      JSONArray.Builder JSONArray.Builder.add​(java.lang.Boolean value)
      Add a boolean JSON value
      JSONArray.Builder JSONArray.Builder.add​(java.lang.CharSequence value)
      Add a String JSON value
      JSONArray.Builder JSONArray.Builder.add​(java.lang.Number value)
      Create a numeric JSON value
      JSONArray.Builder JSONArray.Builder.add​(java.lang.Object value)
      Add a value to an array.
      JSONArray.Builder JSONArray.Builder.add​(JSONNode value)
      Add a JSON value containing another JSON document
      JSONArray.Builder JSONArray.Builder.addAll​(JSONArray existing)
      Add all the items in the existing JSONArray to this array.
      JSONArray.Builder JSONArray.Builder.addNull()
      Add a null value
      JSONArray.Builder JSONObjects.array()
      Create a new JSONArray.Builder instance
      JSONArray.Builder JSONArray.modify()
      Return a JSONArray.Builder instance initialized with the state of this JSONArray instance
